channel.title: SFI-EFLU on SFI EFLU
channel.description: Recent content in SFI-EFLU on SFI EFLU

item.title: About Us
item.description: As members of the Students’ Federation of India (SFI), we are proud to represent one of the largest and most active student organizations in India.

item.title: Anti CAA Protest
item.description: SFI EFLU organized a protest gathering against the BJP government’s unconstitutional implementation of CAA.

item.title: Call for protest
item.description: In the light of central government’s implementation of the unconstitutional Citizenship Amendment Act, SFI EFLU calls for a protest gathering against this Sanghparivar agenda that attacks the roots of secularism and constitutional rights.

item.title: Karl Marx's Death Anniversary
item.description: Today marks the 141st death anniversary of Karl Marx.

item.title: Statement

item.title: We reject CAA
item.description: SFI EFLU condemns and opposes the implementation of the unconstitutional CAA.
